column5: Artificial weeds..  Looks interesting, seen them on in fishermen...
seeing as how Nature Vision, Inc is no longer..... I would be very weary... I feel for those with the Aquavu when repairs are required...  http://www.globenewswire.com/newsroom/news.html?d=171509  G
fake plants to anchor in a water body and wait for fish to make it home then catch them...time? money? naive? gullible?
well I have to say that I use to put small trees and branches down and it sure brought and held fish

Most places in the US allow you to place brush piles in lakes. Works great for fish. It attracts them every time. I look for guys placing trees on the ice each year and mark with GPS to find them in spring. They will always produce for me.
Recycle your christmas tree.. just dump it off the end of your dock

I think thats going a little far ???  Building artificial reefs or structure is good sense but to spend cash on what mother nature is already doing naturally well......I already cuss the weeds out as I'm ripping them off the bottom so I don't think I'd go out and spend my hard earned cash to put plastic ones back in.  I'm sure there will be someone out there interested in this stuff..... but not I

yeah but you take the plastic ones home with you each night  you set up on the ice, cut a few holes around the one you want to fish put down the weeds and fish then remove them if you move to a new spot

Actually guys i wasn't going to fork out money for them. I was thinkin of making my own kinda thing.. I have a bunch of burlap i was thinkin of makin something up because the lake i live on has nothing in deep water for structure its like a bath tub. And the fish are out in 20ft of water but they are everywhere not holding to any particular spot..
Ordered a new Quad camera from  Aqua-view  3 weeks before Christmas , arrived after 5 days , great service.

It is an interesting concept Terry but wouldn't it take a little time to attract fish to some newly placed weeds or would they just come and hang right away ?? Heres a thought...What about those suspended fish that don't hang around weeds..The possibilities are endless

first if you are icefishing, you are fishing s spot that you believe there is fish  if there isn't natural cover in the area the fish will come to cover, always even if you were to suspend the weeds  to get suspended fish, the fish in the area will move to the cover  25 or so years ago I was placing xmas trees all over cooks bay in areas near were there were fish but not good cover and on dropoffs that should hold fish  within days I would be catching fish in those areas  the barrie bassmasters are collecting  xmas trees right now to make fish habitat on simcoe
25 years ago? from the look of you on  the video you must have been doing since you were 4 years old!!!

I bought the fake weeds last year (reel weeds) and they work huge. They hold fish, and bring in lots of other fish as well, great investment, and you really bring the fish to you using this method. I highly recommend them.
the video is from the bassmaster collecting trees now
